idea-plugin.name: Base16 Summerfruit Light
idea-plugin.vendor: Christopher Corley (http://christop.club/), Chris Kempson, and Shirom Makkad
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Summerfruit Light for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Christopher Corley (http://christop.club/). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
